list_translation_mean.translate_mean: trả lời tất cả câu hỏi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: easy to perceive, understand, or interpret.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: hướng rõ ràng và chính xác

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the clear glass of the French windows
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kính trong của cửa sổ tiếng Pháp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: free of any obstructions or unwanted objects.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: with a clear road ahead he shifted into high gear
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: với một con đường rõ ràng phía trước, anh ta chuyển sang thiết bị cao

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting a palatalized form of the sound of the letter l (as in leaf in most accents of English).
so as to be out of the way of or away from.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he leapt clear of the car
he had time to get clear away
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã có thời gian để có được từ chối

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: remove an obstruction or unwanted item or items from.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the drive had been cleared of snow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ổ đĩa đã được dọn sạch tuyết

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: remove (an obstruction or unwanted item) from somewhere.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Karen dọn sạch những tấm bẩn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: get past or over (something) safely or without touching it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the plane rose high enough to clear the trees
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Máy bay tăng đủ cao để làm sạch cây

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: officially show or declare (someone) to be innocent.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his sport's ruling body had cleared him of cheating
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cơ thể cai trị của thể thao anh ta đã dọn sạch anh ta vì gian lận

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give official approval or authorization to.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I cleared him to return to his squadron
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã dọn sạch anh ta để trở về phi đội của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: earn or gain (an amount of money) as a net profit.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I would hope to clear £50,000 profit from each match
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi hy vọng sẽ xóa 50.000 bảng lợi nhuận từ mỗi trận đấu
